metadata.title: CVE-2018-4246 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.4 isaffected. Safari before 11.1.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.5 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7.5 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.4 isaffected. watchOS before 4.3.1 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via acrafted web site that leverages type confusion.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
